attributes.action: Abolish Air Passenger Duty completely, like our European colleagues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This tax is a hinderence to the free movement of individuals, damaging to the employment of thousands of people who work within the Air industry, and the industry as a whole and does not provide any environmental benefit. It is time to stop scrounging every possible penny from the citizens of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
